name: Madam Sarah Anne
description:
Sleeve Slider, the new creation to Esther Jean.  A innovated concept to adding some extra pizzaz to your style.  Sleeve Sliders are great to wear with strapless dresses or even over your shirt.  It's a daring new direction to fashion.

Sleeve Slider & Brooch: Madam Sarah Anne - 2 PIECE SET
DESCRIPTION: Vintage raw silk & embroider sleeve cap, nickel eyelets, chiffon flower, ostrich feather, rose gold chain & mother of pearl charm dipped in 24kt.

Brooch: $130.00, Sleeve Slider: $270.00

name: The Cerulean Canary
description:
Esther Jean is bringing back an elegance of the Watteau era of lavish birds & feathers intwining in a ladies grand updo masterpiece.  The Cerulean Canary adds the glamour to any soiree a damsel might find herself partaking.

Barrette: The Cerulean Canary
DESCRIPTION: Pheasant feather, velvet flower, vintage bird, vintage trim & nickel plated comb fastening.

name: Jezabelle Flapper
description:
Esther Jean's the Jezabelle Flapper is all about making an entrance.  Uncaging the divine Goddess within to razzle-dazzle in a world of beauty & glamour.  This piece of artwork can be worn in multiple styles, giving you the look of a beautiful flower child to a roaring sparkling diamond. 

Headdress: Jezabelle Flapper - TWO STYLES TO BE WORN
DESCRIPTION: French lace, hemp trim, ostrich feather & chiffon flower.

name: Permelia of Peace
description:
Esther Jean is all about designing creations that have multiple ways of expressing the Goddess within.  This 2 piece set not only transcends as a whimsical avant garde headdress, but it is also wearable as a choker & brooch.  Taking fashion from one extreme to the next, Permelia of Peace is all about making a statement that declares you have no limitations to fashion.

Headdress: Permelia of Peace - 2 PIECE SET
DESCRIPTION: Fashion stained flower & dove, ostrich feather, rose gold chain, pink citrine charm, coral charm & ivory flower charm dipped in 24kt wrapped in a suede leather backing with antiqued platted clasp pinned to flocked fabric, crochet beaded & vintage trim.

Choker: $212.00, Brooch: $208.00

name: Hester Rose
description:
Esther Jean's reversible choker is a majestic look to any woman's features.  Hester Rose frames the neck to bring a sense of artistic appeal through the velvet and lace fabrications.  With two different styles to be worn with this piece, you can express whatever mood you desire to embody.

Choker & Brooch: Hester Rose - 2 PIECE SET
DESCRIPTION: embroidered rose trim (reversible side), velvet fashion stained & vintage trim, pheasant feather, velvet flower, vintage buttons, rose gold chain, yellow mother of pearl charm & pink citrine charm dipped in 24kt.

Chocker: $218.00, Brooch: $142.00
